vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Included with: μήτῐς
or μή τις, ὁ, ἡ, neuter μήτῐ, genitive μήτῐνος: (τὶς) old Gr. and Cretan dialect for μηδείς, [Refs 8th c.BC+]; Cretan dialect dative singular μηδιμί [Refs] —hence
__1 μήτι or μή τι, adverb, with imperative, and infinitive used imperatively, [Refs 8th c.BC+]: with optative to express a wish, ὄλοιντο μή τι πάντες [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__2 after Verbs of fear or doubt, [Refs 8th c.BC+]
__3 in direct questions, μή τί σοι δοκῶ ταρβεῖ; do I.. ? (i.e. I do not), [NT+4th c.BC+]
__4 μή τί γε let alone, much less, οὐδὲ στρατιώτης οὗτός γε οὐδενός ἐστιν ἄξιος, μή τί γε τῶν ἄλλων ἡγεμών [Refs 4th c.BC+]; later, not to mention, οὐκ οἴδατε ὅτι ἀγγέλους κρινοῦμε; μήτι γε βιωτικά [NT]: with a word between, ὡς.. δώσοντι δίκην, μή τι ποιήσαντί γε [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: unless, no, surely not, (often not translated; expects a negative answer to a question)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
often not translated; expects a no answer to a question: surely not, unless see definition
interrogative particle, used in questions expecting a negative answer; has the same use as μή in the form εἰ μήτε, Lk. 9:3; also when prefixed to an interrogative clause, Mt. 7:16; Jn. 4:29
vocabInfos._es_Definition: utilizado en preguntas a las cuales se espera una respuesta negativa ; a veces se utiliza para indicar que el que interroga tiene dudas con respecto a la respuesta (MAT.12:23; JN.4:29) ; a menos que, a no ser que
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 用於問句中, 期待否定的答案
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 用于问句中, 期待否定的答案
